text: adhkr lahum -ayha alrswl-: hin qal rabuk llmlaykt: 'iiniy khaliq bshrana min tyn. fa'iidha swwayt jasadih wkhlqh wanafakht fih alrwh, fdbt fih alhyat, fasjuduu lah sjwd tahiatan w'ikram, la sjwd eibadat wtezym; falebadt la takun 'illa lilah whdh. waqad hrram allah fi shryet al'islam alsujud llthyt
